synopsis.native: Uno sguardo al processo artistico e alle relazioni personali di Christo, artista noto per le sue installazioni su larga scala. Per la prima volta dalla scomparsa della moglie, si propone di realizzare un progetto ideato con lei.
synopsis.english: An uncensored look into the artistic process and personal relationships of Christo, an artist known for his large-scale installations. For the first time since the passing of his wife and partner, Jeanne-Claude, Christo sets out to realize, The Floating Piers, a project they conceived together many years before.
